# SF6Dvalues

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of SF6Dvalues is to provide calculators and tools for SF-6D value sets.

## Installation

This is an early development version of `SF6Dvalues` and is not yet fully functional. You can install the most recent version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("uo-cmor/SF6Dvalues")
```

## Example

This section will provide some basic examples of the use of the package.
